# urcad.es

Personal website and blog of Édouard Urcades, a designer and artist.

## Content
- /writing/ - Blog posts and essays
- /work/ - Portfolio of design work
- /about/ - Contact and bio

## Machine-readable endpoints
- /rss.xml - RSS feed with full post content
- /api/posts.json - JSON list of all posts
- /sitemap.xml - XML sitemap

## Author
Édouard Urcades <edouard@urcad.es>
